content: written pattern also available in italian grab your free crochet basket pattern and get crafty this is the perfect crochet basket pattern for your modern home nursery office you name it i believe that all crocheters want to get a feel for how a pattern is and build a trust factor with the pattern designer for that reason i wanted to make a free pattern to share for the love of crochet there are several pictures step-by-step instructions and stitch explanations size basket measures 10 l x 6 w x 5 5 d skill level beginner-intermediate terminology standard us crochet terms materials needed hook size 10 n/p 1 medium skein of white t-shirt yarn light gray and dark gray from hoooked buying crochet books and magazines is outdated and most people don t even use half of the patterns in those books buy single patterns instead that are exactly what you are looking for you won t regret it copyright notice you may not sell or redistribute this pattern nor use the pictures in it you may however sell what you make from it if so please reference my shop as the origin of the pattern
